revised_title: Electrohydrodynamics of a Liquid Drop: Development of the Flow Field
tldr: This article investigates the development of the flow field in a liquid drop immersed in a conducting fluid, induced by an electric field stress. The author assumes that the electric field stress is set up instantaneously and analyzes the development of the flow field as the drop is deformed. The study focuses on balancing the surface tension and electric field stress, as well as the hydrodynamic stresses produced by liquid flow in the drop and its surroundings.
